definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Theodore Dreiser is regarded as an outstanding representative of American naturalism.
sentences.chinese: 德萊塞被認爲是美國自然主義文學的傑出代表。

sentences.english: We reject both naturalistic and theistic evolution.
sentences.chinese: 我們反對自然主義和進化論。

sentences.english: The Western naturism has influence on the new period literature of China.
sentences.chinese: 西方自然主義對中國新時期的文學是有影響的。

sentences.english: Still, naturalism is not as restrictive as it sounds.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，自然主義並不像它聽起來那麼狹隘。

sentences.english: We are the supporter and practioner of Naturalism .
sentences.chinese: 我們是自然主義的實踐者和倡導者。
“這個非常自然主義，”他回憶說。

sentences.english: Tayama Katai is the representative writer of the naturalistic novels in Meiji in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 田山花袋是明治時期日本自然主義文學的代表作家。

sentences.english: With methodology, Nan Le-shan is deeply influenced by Whitehead and takes the naturalistic approach.
sentences.chinese: 在方法論上，南樂山採取自然主義的進路，深受。

sentences.english: Naturalism is not incompatible in principle with all forms of religion.
sentences.chinese: 原則上自然主義並不與所有的宗教形式不相容。

sentences.english: Its preface serves as a classic manifesto of late-nineteenth century naturalism.
sentences.chinese: 其前言作爲一個典型的宣言晚十九世紀自然主義。

sentences.english: Wright is writing very much in the vein of those writers.
sentences.chinese: 就有這樣的美國自然主義特徵。

sentences.english: Ultimately, the authors reject the naturalism argument.
sentences.chinese: 最終，這兩個作者駁斥了自然主義的論點。

sentences.english: Naturalism as dogma is one more enemy of the scientific spirit.
sentences.chinese: 自然主義作爲一種信條不過是科學精神的又一個敵人。

sentences.english: Then, I analyze naturalism inside Park Giiell as an example.
sentences.chinese: 然後，以威爾公園作爲實例，分析其中的自然主義。

sentences.english: Thoreau was a philosopher of nature and its relation to the human condition.
sentences.chinese: 梭羅是一名自然主義哲學家，而這和人類的境況相關。

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
